product_name: Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Loaded with comfort features and performance details, the women's Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Shorts will be your new everyday riding favorite. Compression fabric is pleasingly textured and wicks moisture to keep you dry. Wide waistband and gripper-free, non-pressure leg bands flatter and feel comfortable. Anatomical multipanel design fits like a glove. Women-specific Tour 3D chamois is designed for beginning enthusiasts to intermediate riders. Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Shorts for women have reflective elements to aid visibility in low light.
short_description: Loaded with comfort features and performance details, the women's Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Shorts will be your new everyday riding favorite.
